程序包 src.main.java.Login_story1_3

类 UserManagementController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.Login_story1_3.UserManagementController
public class UserManagementController extends Object
Title : UserManagementController.java Description: Controller for the user management view. It initializes the form with user data, handles form updates, and provides navigation back to the main menu.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the form. 1. Initializes the gender options in the choice box. 2. Loads all users from the CSV file and finds the current user based on the session nickname. 3. If the user is found, updates the form fields with the user's information; otherwise, shows an error alert.

    • setUser

      public void setUser(User user)
      Set the current user. Runs the updateFormFields method on the JavaFX application thread.
      参数:
      user - The user object.

    • updateFormFields

      private void updateFormFields()
      Updates the form fields with the current user's information. Handles potential date parsing exceptions and shows an error alert if necessary.

    • handleUpdate

      private void handleUpdate()
      Handles the update button click event. Validates the form fields, updates the user information, saves the changes to the CSV file, and shows a success or error alert accordingly.

    • saveUserChanges

      private void saveUserChanges(User user)
      Saves the user changes to the CSV file. Loads all users from the CSV, updates the corresponding user information, and then saves all users back to the CSV.
      参数:
      user - The user object with updated information.

    • loadUsersFromCSV

      private List<User> loadUsersFromCSV()
      Loads all users from the CSV file. Parses each line of the CSV and creates User objects.
      返回:
      A list of User objects.

    • saveUsersToCSV

      private void saveUsersToCSV(List<User> users)
      Saves a list of users to the CSV file. Converts each user object to a CSV line and writes them to the file.
      参数:
      users - A list of User objects.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an alert with the given title and message. Calls the overloaded showAlert method with a null post-action.
      参数:
      title - The title of the alert.
      message - The message of the alert.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message, Runnable postAction)
      Displays an alert with the given title, message, and an optional post-action. Runs on the JavaFX application thread.
      参数:
      title - The title of the alert.
      message - The message of the alert.
      postAction - An optional callback function to be executed after the alert is closed.
